trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_SEQ_00<tab>Jeryk may come to regret his next decision.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Thaffe.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Urianger.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_TODO_02<tab>Search for Thancred.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_MAGNUS_000_000<tab>I thought I told you to leave!
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_005<tab>I'm sorry, but I think it'd be for the best if you just forgot about the Talos.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THANCRED_000_010<tab>What could be so terrible he'd want to keep it from us?
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_RYNE_000_015<tab>I hope Jeryk doesn't get in trouble for telling us what happened.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_020<tab>Though the Talos yet wants for a beating heart, it would appear thine efforts were not for naught.

TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_JERYK_000_030<tab>Right, then. The Talos...their hearts cannot be made of just any stone. You need a special sort with sufficient aetherial conductivity. Both it and the other materials used in the construction of Talos bodies are mined in the same place...
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_JERYK_000_031<tab>That place, of course, being here. The Hills of Amber...
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_JERYK_000_032<tab>And it was three years ago when...when she...
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_JERYK_000_033<tab>No, no I can't. I'm sorry, but you'll have to hear it from Thaffe or someone else.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THANCRED_000_034<tab><sigh> Back to the tavern, then.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THANCRED_000_040<tab>You don't suppose Thaffe is going to run off too, do you?
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_RYNE_000_045<tab>This is all my fault. I never should have pressured him.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_050<tab>What terrible tragedy befell him years ago, I wonder...
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_060<tab>Still here, eh? You can ask again, but the answer's the same. Our trolleys are─
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_061<tab>What!? Godsdammit Jeryk. You could've at least finished so I wouldn't have to clean up your mess.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_062<tab>Seeing how you made such quick progress in fixing that Talos and all, he was probably thinking you could help change things around here.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_063<tab>And I think he may be right... Gather your friends, and I'll tell you what you want to know.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_RYNE_000_070<tab>Why must he always treat me like this...
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_MAGNUS_000_075<tab>If not for those damned Talos, she'd...she'd...
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_080<tab>I wish there was more we could do for you, I truly do. But after Agna's accident, no one is allowed near those mines.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_090<tab>Full well do I know the pain of loss and how heavily it can weigh on one's heart. Nevertheless, there is but one way forward.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_091<tab>We must needs procure a new heart for the Talos.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_092<tab>Thaffe. Knowest thou any location wherein we might find the stone we require? No matter how scant the possibility, we would seize it.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_093<tab>I told you near all of the veins were tapped dry years ago. ...Though I suppose, if you really wanted to try, you may find something at Nuvy's Leavings.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_094<tab>It was opened well before Talos became commonplace, which is why the mining there was never quite as deep.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_095<tab>When you get there, look for Guthjon and tell him I sent you. But don't be surprised if he tells you the same thing.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_096<tab>Thine assistance is most appreciated.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_097<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I think it best Thancred join thee in this search.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_098<tab>Though he wouldst be quick to deny it, his heart is in turmoil, and his thoughts clouded.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_099<tab>'Twould be unwise to ignore his distress.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_URIANGER_000_110<tab>I prithee attend Thancred and keep him occupied with the task at hand.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THAFFE_000_115<tab>Guthjon has worked in these mines longer than near anyone I know. You'd do well to heed his advice in there.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THANCRED_000_120<tab>Off to somewhere, are you?
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THANCRED_000_121<tab>At last, a lead on the stone we need to power the Talos.
TEXT_LUCKMD110_03615_THANCRED_000_122<tab>I can't very well have you go on your own. Lead the way.
